metadata.svg_color: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 160 240"><g xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="logo" fill="#466BB0"><rect xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="background" width="160" height="240" fill="#fff"></rect><polygon xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="hull" points="0 210 160 210 60 240"></polygon><polygon xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="mainsail" points="0 200 60 190 60 80"></polygon><polygon xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="headsail" points="70 190 160 200 70 0"></polygon></g></svg>
